hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Epona's Song#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Hookshot#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Purple Rupee# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a #generic grotto#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Water Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Left Invisible Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Bottom of the Well#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: Did you know that Stalchildren leave you alone when wearing the Bunny Hood?

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: While you're wasting time reading this hint, the others are playing the seed.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Serenade of Water#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #the Iron Boots#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #the Biggoron Sword# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Left Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Serenade of Water#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Epona's Song#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #1# major item.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path of #gold#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Bottom of the Well#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #1# major item.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that winning the #treasure chest game# rewards #a Red Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a chest spawned by #Sun's Song#.
